text: Oliver Batali Albino (11 November 1935 â€“ 4 January 2020) was a South Sudanese politician, civil servant and writer. He was born in Yei. He served as Minister of Housing and Public Utilities from 1975 to 1978 and as Minister of Labour in 1985. In July 2011, he became a member of South Sudan's Council of States. On 4 January 2020, Albino died of heart failure in Augusta, Georgia, United States. He was 84. == References == Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:African writers Category:Civil servants Category:South Sudanese politicians
title: Oliver Batali Albino
